document_info.title: Product Requirements Document (PRD) - Disfruta P2P Lending Platform
document_info.original_requirements: Build a fully functional peer-to-peer lending platform called Disfruta using blockchain technology, mirroring Prosper Marketplace functionality, including landing page, user authentication, credit check logic, borrowers/lenders pages, smart contract integration, and comprehensive business logic.

product_goals.description: Create a blockchain-powered platform that provides underserved borrowers with accessible, transparent, and fair lending opportunities while eliminating traditional banking intermediaries.
Offer individual and institutional lenders competitive investment opportunities with automated risk assessment, diversified portfolios, and transparent performance tracking.

product_goals.goal: Establish Secure and Transparent Financial Infrastructure
product_goals.description: Leverage blockchain technology and smart contracts to ensure immutable transaction records, automated loan processing, and enhanced security measures that build trust among all platform participants.

stories: I want to apply for loans with minimal paperwork and fast approval times so that I can access funds quickly for debt consolidation, home improvements, or emergency expenses.
I want transparent loan terms and competitive interest rates so that I can make informed financial decisions without hidden fees.
I want automated repayment options and clear payment schedules so that I can manage my loan obligations effectively.

user_stories.role: investor looking for alternative investment opportunities
stories: I want to browse and select loan investments based on risk ratings and potential returns so that I can build a diversified lending portfolio.
I want automated investment tools and portfolio management so that I can maximize returns while minimizing time commitment.
I want real-time performance tracking and transparent reporting so that I can monitor my investments and make data-driven decisions.

user_stories.role: small business owner needing working capital
stories: I want to access business loans without extensive collateral requirements so that I can fund growth opportunities and operational needs.
I want flexible repayment terms that align with my cash flow so that I can maintain business stability while repaying loans.
I want comprehensive risk management tools and fraud detection so that I can maintain platform integrity and protect all users.
I want automated compliance monitoring and reporting so that I can ensure regulatory compliance across all jurisdictions.

direct_competitors.name: Prosper Marketplace
direct_competitors.market_position: Pioneer in P2P lending with strong brand recognition

direct_competitors.name: LendingClub
direct_competitors.market_position: Market leader with significant institutional backing

project_overview.purpose: Disfruta is a revolutionary blockchain-powered peer-to-peer lending platform designed to bridge the gap between traditional finance and decentralized financial services.
project_overview.mission_statement: To create a transparent, accessible, and secure financial ecosystem that empowers individuals and small businesses to achieve their financial goals through innovative blockchain technology and community-driven lending.
project_overview.vision: To become the leading global platform for decentralized peer-to-peer lending, setting new standards for transparency, efficiency, and financial inclusion in the digital economy.

primary_segments.name: Underserved Borrowers
primary_segments.characteristics: Limited credit history, difficulty accessing traditional bank loans, seeking debt consolidation or emergency funding
primary_segments.pain_points: High interest rates from traditional lenders, lengthy approval processes, strict collateral requirements
primary_segments.value_proposition: Faster approvals, competitive rates, transparent terms, accessible application process

primary_segments.name: Alternative Investment Seekers
primary_segments.characteristics: Seeking higher returns than traditional savings/bonds, willing to accept moderate risk, desire portfolio diversification
primary_segments.pain_points: Low returns from traditional investments, limited access to alternative investment opportunities
primary_segments.value_proposition: Attractive returns (5-12% annually), transparent risk assessment, diversified portfolio options

primary_segments.name: Small Business Owners
primary_segments.demographics: Business owners with 1-50 employees, annual revenue $100K-$2M
primary_segments.characteristics: Need working capital, equipment financing, or expansion funds
primary_segments.pain_points: Difficult bank approval processes, insufficient collateral, cash flow challenges
primary_segments.value_proposition: Flexible terms, faster funding, less stringent requirements

primary_segments.name: Crypto-Native Users
primary_segments.demographics: Ages 20-40, cryptocurrency enthusiasts, early technology adopters
primary_segments.characteristics: Comfortable with blockchain technology, seek DeFi opportunities
primary_segments.pain_points: Limited integration between traditional finance and crypto assets
primary_segments.value_proposition: Seamless crypto integration, yield farming opportunities, governance participation

growth_drivers: 25-30% CAGR in P2P lending market through 2034
Increasing demand for alternative financing solutions
Growing acceptance of blockchain technology in finance
Rising interest in decentralized financial services
Regulatory clarity improving in major jurisdictions

revenue_streams.rate: 1-5% of loan amount charged to borrowers
1% annual fee on outstanding loan principal from lenders
0.5% on loan funding and repayment transactions

revenue_streams.description: Subscription fees for advanced analytics and auto-invest tools

technical_specifications.requirements_analysis: The Disfruta platform requires a comprehensive technical architecture that seamlessly integrates traditional web application components with blockchain infrastructure. The system must support high-volume transactions, real-time risk assessment, automated smart contract execution, and regulatory compliance across multiple jurisdictions.

core_technical_requirements.frontend_framework: React.js with TypeScript for type safety and maintainability
core_technical_requirements.styling: Tailwind CSS for responsive, utility-first design
core_technical_requirements.backend_services: Node.js with Express.js for API development
core_technical_requirements.database: PostgreSQL for relational data, IPFS for decentralized storage
core_technical_requirements.payment_processing: Integration with traditional payment gateways and crypto wallets

p0_requirements: User Authentication System with MFA and KYC/AML compliance
Smart Contract Core Functionality for loans, funding, and repayments
Credit Assessment Engine with ML-based risk modeling
Core Web Pages including landing, borrower, and lender dashboards
p1_requirements: Advanced Investment Features with auto-invest and secondary market
Enhanced Security Measures with auditing and fraud detection
p2_requirements: Advanced Analytics with predictive market analysis
Integration Capabilities with third-party financial services
Community Features with networking and educational content

smart_contracts: LoanFactory.sol: Creates and manages loan instances
Loan.sol: Individual loan contract with terms and conditions
UserRegistry.sol: Manages user identities and permissions
Treasury.sol: Platform fee collection and distribution

functional_requirements: Display clear value proposition within 3 seconds of page load
Include separate CTA buttons for borrowers and lenders
Showcase real-time statistics: total loans funded, average interest rates, success stories
Responsive and optimized for mobile devices with load times under 2 seconds
Interactive 'How It Works' section with step-by-step process visualization
non_functional_requirements: Page load time must not exceed 2 seconds on 3G connection
Support 10,000+ concurrent visitors without performance degradation

signup_signin_requirements: Email address and secure password account creation
Multi-factor authentication (MFA) using SMS, email, or authenticator apps
Password requirements: minimum 12 characters with mixed case, numbers, and symbols
Account verification with email confirmation and identity verification (KYC)
security_requirements: Account lockout after 5 failed login attempts
All authentication data encrypted using AES-256 encryption
Session tokens expire after 24 hours of inactivity
Log all authentication events for security monitoring

credit_scoring_requirements: Integration with major credit bureaus (Experian, Equifax, TransUnion)
Alternative data analysis including bank transaction history
Real-time credit score updates and improvement recommendations
Credit assessment completed within 60 seconds of application submission
Risk ratings from A (lowest risk) to HR (highest risk)
machine_learning_integration: Machine learning models to assess creditworthiness beyond traditional scores
Continuously update risk models based on platform performance data
Provide explanations for credit decisions to ensure transparency

application_management: Submit loan applications with amounts from $1,000 to $50,000
Multi-step application wizard with progress indicators
Document upload support (income verification, bank statements)
View and accept loan offers from multiple lenders
loan_management: Display all active loans with current balances and payment schedules
Multiple payment methods (bank transfer, card, crypto)
Automated payment reminders 7, 3, and 1 days before due dates
Early payment options with interest savings calculations

investment_management: Browse available loan opportunities with detailed risk assessments
Filtering options by risk level, interest rate, loan term, and amount
Invest in partial loans with minimum investments of $25
Display expected returns and historical performance data
portfolio_analytics: Detailed monthly statements and tax documents
Secondary market trading of loan investments

core_business_rules: Interest rates dynamically calculated based on risk assessment and market conditions
Loan terms range from 12 to 60 months with fixed monthly payments
Maintain reserve fund for potential defaults (3% of total loans)
All transactions recorded on blockchain for transparency and immutability
smart_contract_requirements: Automatically execute loan funding upon reaching funding goals
Handle automated interest calculations and distribution to lenders
Implement automated default handling with grace periods
Enable early loan payoffs with appropriate interest adjustments
Gas-optimized contract interactions for cost efficiency

core_contract_requirements: Implement factory pattern for creating individual loan contracts
Each loan represented by unique smart contract with immutable terms
Support partial funding from multiple lenders
Implement automated interest distribution to all lenders
Handle early repayment with pro-rated interest calculations
security_and_auditing: All smart contracts undergo third-party security audits before deployment
Implement emergency pause functionality for critical issues
Use multi-signature wallets for administrative functions
Contract upgrades follow time-locked governance process
Critical functions implement reentrancy guards and overflow protection

network_requirements: Support Ethereum mainnet for production deployment
Compatible with layer-2 solutions (Polygon, Arbitrum) for cost optimization
Maintain compatibility with major wallet providers (MetaMask, WalletConnect)
Implement proper gas estimation and optimization strategies

governance_token: May implement governance token for community decision-making
Token holders able to vote on key platform parameters and upgrades
Reward active participants with governance tokens
Fair and transparent token distribution with clear vesting schedules

hybrid_storage_strategy: Public loan data stored on-chain for transparency
Personal user information stored off-chain with encrypted references
Implement IPFS for decentralized document storage
All data handling complies with GDPR and applicable privacy regulations

activities: System architecture design and database schema
Core infrastructure and smart contract deployment
Smart contract security audit and penetration testing
Application testing and user acceptance testing
Beta user onboarding and performance monitoring
Bug fixes and user feedback collection

business_metrics: Default rates and risk management effectiveness

critical_measures: Formal verification for mathematical proof of correctness
Time locks for critical updates with mandatory waiting periods
Circuit breakers for emergency pause functionality
Role-based access controls with principle of least privilege
vulnerability_prevention: Reentrancy attacks prevention through checks-effects-interactions pattern
Integer overflow/underflow protection using SafeMath libraries
Flash loan attack protection through proper collateralization checks
Oracle manipulation resistance through multiple data sources

frontend_security: XSS protection through input sanitization and output encoding
Secure cookie configuration with HttpOnly and Secure flags
backend_security: API rate limiting and DDoS protection
Secure authentication with JWT and MFA
Regular security audits and penetration testing
data_protection: Regular backup and disaster recovery testing

technical_risks.mitigation: Comprehensive audits, formal verification, bug bounty programs
Layer-2 integration, gas optimization, alternative blockchain support

business_risks.mitigation: Proactive compliance monitoring, legal advisory board, regulatory sandboxes
Diversified loan portfolio, dynamic risk pricing, reserve fund maintenance

operational_risks.mitigation: Knowledge documentation, succession planning, competitive compensation
Redundant systems, incident response plans, cyber insurance

financial_metrics: Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) payback period < 12 months
Platform take rate: 2-3% of loan volume

data_sources: Prosper Marketplace public filings and documentation
DeFi protocol analysis and TVL data
